description: Sample evaluation dataset for testing the AI requirements evaluator

samples.requirement: The system shall respond quickly to user requests.
The system shall allow users to log in using email and password, with authentication completing within 3 seconds.
samples.notes: Clear requirement with measurable time constraint

samples.requirement: The system shall store user data securely using AES-256 encryption at rest and TLS 1.3 for data in transit.
samples.notes: Specific security requirement with verifiable standards

samples.requirement: Users must be able to reset their password.
samples.notes: Missing details about the reset process, validation, etc.

samples.requirement: The API shall return HTTP 200 for successful requests and HTTP 400 for invalid input, with response times under 500ms for 95% of requests.
samples.notes: Well-defined API behavior with performance requirements

samples.requirement: The system should handle errors gracefully.
The system shall support concurrent access by at least 1000 users without degradation in response time (defined as average response time staying below 200ms).
samples.notes: Specific scalability requirement with measurable criteria

samples.requirement: The system shall send email notifications to users within 5 minutes of triggering events, with a delivery success rate of at least 99.5%.
